subtext: You're paying for a monthly service, so none of that time paid should include downtime!
Support for Tekkit, FTB, ATLauncher servers such as the MadPack, Monster, DireWolf20, and more !
Access to your files should be easy! That’s why all of our servers support full FTP file access
You’ve got enough to worry about, take disk space off that list
CPU’s are very important to providing lag free service, Why should you be limited?
Your players will see very low latency when playing on your server!
Not everyone plays from the states, thus we don't limit our hosting to the states! Be sure to checkout all of our locations!
We offer servers from 512mb to 32GB and beyond, with industry leading CPUs to get you gaming at peak performance!
